sections.title: Syntax
sections.text_content: drawfillstar (x1, y1, x2, y2, Color : int)

sections.title: Description
sections.raw_content: The drawfillstar procedure is used to draw a filled five pointed star on the screen bounded by a rectangle with bottom left and top right corners of (x1, y1) to (x2, y2) and filled using the specified Color. To get a star outlined in a different color, use drawfillstar with the Color parameter set to the fill color and then call drawstar with the Color parameter set to the border color. If y1 is greater than y2, then the star is drawn upside down.
sections.text_content: The drawfillstar procedure is used to draw a filled five pointed star on the screen bounded by a rectangle with bottom left and top right corners of (x1, y1) to (x2, y2) and filled using the specified Color. To get a star outlined in a different color, use drawfillstar with the Color parameter set to the fill color and then call drawstar with the Color parameter set to the border color. If y1 is greater than y2, then the star is drawn upside down.
sections.mdown_content:
The **drawfillstar** procedure is used to draw a filled five pointed star on the screen bounded by a rectangle with bottom left and top right corners of (_x1_, _y1_) to (_x2_, _y2_) and filled using the specified _Color_. To get a star outlined in a different color, use **drawfillstar** with the _Color_ parameter set to the fill color and then call **drawstar** with the _Color_ parameter set to the border color. If _y1_ is greater than _y2_, then the star is drawn upside down.



![Doc Image](drawfillstar01.gif)

sections.title: Example
sections.raw_content: This program will draw two stars beside each other. The first will be outlined in color 1 and filled in color 2. The second star will be upside down and both filled and outlined in color 3.
sections.text_content: This program will draw two stars beside each other. The first will be outlined in color 1 and filled in color 2. The second star will be upside down and both filled and outlined in color 3.
sections.mdown_content: This program will draw two stars beside each other. The first will be outlined in color 1 and filled in color 2. The second star will be upside down and both filled and outlined in color 3.

sections.title: Details
sections.raw_content:
The drawfillstar procedure is useful for drawing the American flag.

The meaning of the Color number depends on the current palette. See the palette statement.

The screen should be in a "graphics" mode. See the setscreen procedure for details. If the screen is not in a "graphics" mode, it will automatically be set to "graphics" mode.
sections.text_content:
The drawfillstar procedure is useful for drawing the American flag.
The meaning of the Color number depends on the current palette. See the palette statement.
The screen should be in a "graphics" mode. See the setscreen procedure for details. If the screen is not in a "graphics" mode, it will automatically be set to "graphics" mode.
sections.mdown_content:
The **drawfillstar** procedure is useful for drawing the American flag.

The meaning of the _Color_ number depends on the current palette. See the **palette** statement.

The screen should be in a "_graphics_" mode. See the **setscreen** procedure for details. If the screen is not in a "_graphics_" mode, it will automatically be set to "_graphics_" mode.
